Text: Me̩ gbo̩ o̩la ki Jihofa aka ñw me̩, ame̩ abunyi Israe̩l.
Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
todu e̩wñ o̩hio̩gu amone̩ du ku ma che chʼo̩wai.
Ama kʼajifa kpʼo̩jamalia cho̩ñwe̩ nyʼu,
I dab oli ku ma du gwʼanyane̩ ku ma kʼina nyʼu ofo,
I nʼe̩ne̩ du ki dab uwe̩ n, O Jihofa;
E̩ne̩ do̩mo̩ ki ma arailo we̩ n? O Onu abo uche̩ichi?
Ma muda dab ame̩la chaka, ma nʼibe n;
I nʼajifa ku ma gwu kpe̩te̩ke̩ ku ma ko kwo Tarshish wa,
Jihofa muda chʼO̩jo̩ ogbolo;
Alu kʼuwe̩ aka ñw ma de̩ kakini, Amo̩jo̩ ku ma ma che efojale kpʼane̩ ile̩-i n, abo-i alenyo̩ bʼane̩-ile̩ te̩, kpʼakwʼo̩gane̩ efojale-i te̩ ge̩.
Owñ-i nʼukpahiu-wñ che ane̩-ile̩-i,
I mʼomu-wñ chi, ekuku omi jʼefojale,
E̩ne̩ du dab e̩la, ma ma e̩wñ du n;
O̩wai i che, uko̩lo̩ ako̩ru i che;
Ukpe̩ e-Jeko̩b la dab abo-i n,
Fʼadu-we̩ kpama bʼane̩-i te̩,
Todu abu ku Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
Atogwo, ekpa ku ma kpa mi!
Unyabo-mi mukpabie̩,
Todu amadide le̩ dab ame̩la me̩,
Omuko̩la inabali! Go, i awa!—
O Jihofa, u chema ka kʼo̩na one̩ dʼef owñ onugo n,
E̩ ko̩ mi o̩la, O Jihofa, e̩ muda che alu kʼoj ajo̩ kʼe̩ dute̩ ka;
Mʼuke̩do̩fulu-we̩ ko danyʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ku ma ma mʼuwe̩ n oji,
